synopsis.text: To achieve global dominance, the wicked Dr. Kaff, a scientist scorned due to his dwarfism, unleashes an army of colossal robots, targeting world-class athletes for abduction. In response, the late Dr. Kim's masterpiece, the powerful Robot Taekwon V, is activated, with his taekwondo champion son, Hoon, taking the helm. Hoon skillfully merges his martial arts prowess with the robot's mechanical might to combat Dr. Kaff's menacing forces. Alongside him is his younger companion, elementary school student Cheol, who brings humor to their thrilling adventures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
